item.title: Cloud Storage Migration & Cloud Security Reseller Opportunity
item.description: Become a Partner Our cloud storage migration tool, Nava Certus, allows for seamless migration to and from various forms of cloud storage, such as Google Apps, Amazon S3, and Dropbox. As a Nava Solutions partner, you will be able to: Resell Nava Solutions products to your customers. Receive favorable pricing. Ability to generate service revenue by offering to perform migration services. 24Ã—7 email support from Nava Solutions. White label agreements will be considered for Premium partners.
